mapper.insert: insert into product(idx,title,password,writer,content,email,hit) values((select NVL(max(idx)+1,1) from tbl_bbs), #{title},#{password},#{writer},#{content},#{email},1)
mapper.select: select * from tbl_bbs order by idx
mapper.update: update tbl_bbs set title=#{title}, password=#{password}, writer=#{writer}, content=#{content}, email=#{email}, hit = #{hit} where idx=#{idx}
